title: @maia/schema/os/schematas-registry
description: Schema registry CoMap - maps schema namekeys (e.g., @maia/schema/data/todos) to schema co-ids (co_z...). Stored in account.os.schematas

additionalProperties.description: Schema namekey → schema co-id mapping (e.g., @maia/schema/data/todos → co_z123...)
